scripts.build: npm run build:web && npm run build:api
scripts.deploy:netlify: cd web && npm run build && netlify deploy --prod --dir=out
scripts.setup: npm install && cd web && npm install && cd ../api && npm install
scripts.db:setup: cd api && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate deploy && npx prisma db seed
scripts.test: cd web && npm run test && cd ../api && npm run test
scripts.lint: cd web && npm run lint && cd ../api && npm run lint
scripts.clean: rm -rf web/node_modules web/.next web/out api/node_modules api/dist
